neocognitron

Class NeocognitronStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • neocognitron.NeocognitronStructure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NeocognitronStructure
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The structure which defines an entire neocognitron network. Contains all needed helper functions, in addition to reading an image from a file and converting it to an input.
    Author:
    Nicholas J. Conn
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • NeocognitronStructure

        public NeocognitronStructure()
        Initialize the NeocognitronStructure. All values are public and can be set once instantiated.

    • Method Detail

      • generateC

        public void generateC()
        Initializes C using gamma. It is a monotonically decreasing function. There is one value for each layer. c[layer][window]

      • generateD

        public void generateD()
        Initializes D using delta and delta bar. It is a monotonically decreasing function. There is one value for each layer. d[layer][window]

      • generateMonotonic

        public double[] generateMonotonic(double base,
                         int size,
                         int planes,
                         boolean norm)
        Generate a monotonically decreasing two dimensional function.
        Parameters:
        base - Base value for function
        size - Size of window used
        planes - Number of planes, used for normalizing
        norm - Normalize the output to have a sumation of 1
        Returns:
        Returns the monotonic two dimensional function

      • getC

        public double[] getC(int layer)
        Get the c weights for a specific layer
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer.
        Returns:
        The C weights for the specific layer

      • getR

        public double getR(int layer)
        Get the r value for a specific layer
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer.
        Returns:
        The r value for the specific layer

      • arrayMultiply

        public static double arrayMultiply(double[] a,
                   double[] b)
        A static function which allows two arrays to be multiplied together. This represents the dot product of a matrix.
        Parameters:
        a - Input vector a
        b - Input vector b
        Returns:
        Dot product of a*b

      • readImage

        public static double[][] readImage(java.io.File file)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a specific monochromatic image and returns a two dimensional representation of the image. A zero for black, and a one for all other colors.
        Parameters:
        file - Input file
        Returns:
        Resulting double used as an input to the neocognitron.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
